title: New help requested ...
content:
Hi everybody,

agan, I need your help to identify the attached font ...

Thanks in advance for your help!

doudi

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PfisterHaus.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614224440/http:/typophile.com/files/PfisterHaus.jpg) | 123.18 KB |
author: doudi

comments.content:
Looks like a half-a55ed knockoff of Futura Black.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614224440im_/http:/typophile.com/files/futblack_4388.gif)

Yeah, it's something close!!

Futura Black will be great enough !!

Many thanks!

Also check out [Braggadocio](http://web.archive.org/web/20120614224440/http:/fontshop.com/search/?&q=braggadocio&x=0&y=0&sample_text=Pfister%20Haus) (it's got a nice 'fi' lig).

- Lex
